decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration
of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance
with the following approved plans: 1329/00-01/B, 1329/00-02/A, and
1303-00-03 (other than in respect of the rear balcony and staircase that
are not the subject of this permission).

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the
following times; 11.00 hours and 14.00 hours and 17.00 hours and 21.30
hours on Mondays to Fridays; 11.00 hours and 15.00 hours and 17.00
hours and 22.00 hours on Saturdays. It shall not be open to customers
on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The level of noise emitted from the proposed kitchen extraction system,
shall not be less than 10dB(A) below the existing background noise levels
(LAeq), when measured from the nearest noise sensitive receptor, over
any 24 hour period.

Condition : 5 - The development shall not be brought into use until full details of an
extraction system for odours and grease, together with a scheme of noise
insulation to protect the amenities of the occupants above the shop, have
both been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning
authority. Both schemes shall be installed prior to commencement of the
use and shall thereafter be maintained in accordance with the
manufacturer?s recommendations.
description: Change of use from A3 (Restaurant/Cafe) to A5 (Hot Food Takeaway) and installation of cooker extract ventilation system with flue rising externally at rear of property to roof
